description:
-Re-fixed solo, you can clearly hear pulloffs in the isolated track, don't mess around with it, I think now it's all perfect
-Added Kirk's Delay Effect, at the intro it's not that accurate but I made it very low volume so it shouldn't atleast be super loud
-Lowered Volume of the Keyboard and Fixed Keyboard parts
-Added Chords before Kirk plays the solo
-Fixed some vocal tabbing
Now this tab is all good
